Articles.Content:
Sun Gold Aeronautics out debuting with their first plane in the family!

Deligent Lady is a swept wing tailed aircraft designed for joyrides and exploration of the nearby perimeter!

Her two engine design combined with the wheel configuration and weighting allows a powerful and (relatively) safe liftoff and landing. She will never fail on you!

Her beutiful swept wing configuration and long tail will make your fellow Kermans green of envy! Soar through the sky and counquer the hearts of any khick on the ground! They will be swooning as you dismount your beutiful three seat plane, and will beg to go with her! And when you need to kiss and get smoochy, you can always turn on the ASAS computer and leave the plane to keep herself in the air*. When you finally live in a little cottage up the Kerbal Space Mountains with the woman in your life, you can take this thing for a joyride, its three seats makes space for Pilot, woman, AND dog too! Buy Deligent Lady today and invest in the best plane on the production line!
